price: 93. Dheh: Rabbiyow! Haddaad i tuseyso waxa loogu gooddiyo (cadaabka).
arabic: قُل رَّبِّ إِمَّا تُرِيَنِّي مَا يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul rabbi immā turiyannī mā yūʿadūna
